description.value:
Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target. It receives a full meal's worth of nourishment and must attempt a Fortitude save. A target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened] by this spell takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it's no longer Sickened.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}, but if it spends an action to end the condition, it succeeds automatically.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
